{"step_by_step_thinking": "To determine which of the following is not a content of mesorectal fascia, we need to review the relevant documents and understand the anatomy of the mesorectal fascia. According to the documents, the mesorectal fascia is a defined structure that includes the posterior sheath of the endopelvic fascia, the lateral rectal stalks, and the peri-rectal neurovascular structures. It is important to note that the mesorectal fascia does not include the endopelvic fascia and the lateral rectal stalks. Therefore, the correct answer is B. Superior rectal vein, as it is a content of the mesorectal fascia.", "answer_choice": "B"}
